DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate rate onset bronchodilator action aclidinium bromide compare placebo tiotropium patient severe COPD single dose treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Rate Onset Bronchodilator Action Severe Stable Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This single dose , randomise , double-blind , double-dummy , 3 period cross-over , placebo control , multinational , multicentre trial .
DOC.criteria: Males female age ≥ 40 year Current exsmokers ≥ 10 packyear Clinical diagnosis severe stable COPD History current diagnosis asthma , allergic rhinitis , atopy Respiratory tract infection acute COPD exacerbation last 6 week Hospitalised acute COPD exacerbation last 3 month Evidence contraindicate use anticholinergic drug
